lead_paragraph: Tensions have been rising along the western sea border with South Korea, known as the Northern Limit Line, which the North does not recognize.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Shells Fired During Drills
headline.main: North Korea Fires Artillery Shells Into Sea Near Disputed Border

snippet: Tensions have been rising along the western sea border with South Korea, known as the Northern Limit Line, which the North does not recognize.
abstract: North Korea, in previously announced military drill, fires dozens of artillery shells into waters near its disputed western sea border with South Korea.
